feed.title: Category: Darius Burst | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Darius Burst (PSP, 2009)
entry.content:
I played this for the PSP.

This is a hori-shmup. I played it for about 30 minutes, but really didn't like it. It had a lot of problems I find in other non-CAVE, non-Treasure games: slippery controls, invisible bullets, and weird hitboxes. I couldn't enjoy it.
